resources.string: No permissions granted, PhotoFrame cannot work without these permissions and no photo\'s will be displayed!
PhotoFrame needs to read images from the external storage and cannot function without. Please allow the write external storage permission!
Location permission denied. No weather data can be acquired without this permission!
PhotoFrame needs the location permission to retrieve weather data from Google.
Set the time to display one image in seconds.
How often should weather be updated (time in minutes)?
Acquiring weather data failed. Please check location permission!
